objectives.performance: Ensure the cache implementation meets the specified performance criteria, including response time improvements and hit rate targets.
objectives.correctness: Validate that the cache behaves correctly under various scenarios, including concurrent access
objectives.statistics: Verify that the cache accurately tracks and reports real-time statistics such as hits, misses, and success rates.
objectives.usability: Assess the ease of use of the cache API and its integration into client applications. The example application should demonstrate typical usage patterns and compile and run without errors.

requirements.test-coverage: Achieve at least 90% code coverage for the cache implementation through unit and integration tests.
requirements.concurrency-testing: Include tests that simulate multiple simultaneous threads accessing the cache to ensure thread-safety.
requirements.performance-benchmarking: Implement performance benchmarks to measure response time improvements and validate against the 50% improvement target.
requirements.eviction-policy-testing: Create tests to validate the correct functioning of both LRU and TTL eviction policies under various conditions.
requirements.statistics-validation: Develop tests to ensure that cache statistics (hits, misses, success rate) are accurately tracked and reported.

deliverables.test-suite: A comprehensive test suite covering all aspects of the cache implementation, including unit tests, integration tests, and performance benchmarks.
deliverables.test-reports: Detailed reports on test coverage, performance benchmarks, and any issues identified during testing.
deliverables.documentation: Documentation detailing the testing strategy, how to run the tests, and interpret the results.
